name: Narcos
description:
Are you ready to build your own drug empire? [/ b]

Begin your journey with growing ruderalis, develop production to get new recipes, the better the product, the more it costs. Buy dealers of different types to sell your product and production to produce it. If you have already mastered the production of herbs, the time to move on to serious matters, such as metha or cocaine, you can improve each of your products by developing a new recipe and its price will certainly increase. Be careful, because unpleasant things can happen to you, authorities are on the heels and will try to raid your production or dealers as soon as you lose vigilance for the safety of your production and dealers, there are corrupt policemen and lawyers who will compete for your property and dealers if you have already made enough money you can use the services of a banker to increase your capital every second, and it is also worth insuring against future attacks from the authorities by bribing sex teak. While you dream of success, your dealers do not have time to sell all the goods, so you should hire a boss of dealers, this way you can raise the limit on the number of dealers.
